Adjacent dining space integrated within the living area. The design includes wide pathways for wheelchair accessibility, with seating arrangements placed according to Vastu.

Dedicated study or home office area, designed to be quiet and well-ventilated per Vastu guidelines. Accessible design features included.
Second bedroom, designed with accessibility features and quiet orientation per Vastu.
Third bedroom, ensuring sufficient space for wheelchair maneuverability and adherence to Vastu placement guidelines.
